reviewText: Just as I've check these are my rates

I teach beginning genealogy for my church and this is a great how-to get started and takes you from not having anything into some advanced instructions for anyone starting to look for their roots but is extremely helpful for those with African American roots.

Oprah is A phenomenon. She tells Gates that she wished her African roots were with the Zulus, but she accepts Gates' finding that they were from West Africa.
We meet the researchers who work with Gates. Public records in the US can be extensive, but to find roots in Africa requires DNA testing.
I look forward to the next DVD from Gates. I have learned a lot from all the others.
